actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to reduce the number of weeks of employment during the base period required to be eligible for extended benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Federal-State Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to reduce the number of weeks of employment during the base period required for eligibility for extended unemployment compensation benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to reduce the number of weeks of employment during the base period required to be eligible for extended benefits.
